description: Featuring the same versatile performance and durable cotton canvas as their best-selling AP Pant, now in a more relaxed five-pocket construction, the AP5 Relaxed Pant features a unique combination of performance, style, and comfort that's as capable at the sport crag as it is at the obligatory brewpub stop on the way home.
name: Mountain Hardwear Hardwear AP 5 Pocket Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
